hero.headline: Full-Service Real Estate
hero.subline: From first-time buyers to seasoned investors — comprehensive real estate services tailored to every need.

buyingServices.title: Buying
buyingServices.body: Finding the right home in Westchester County takes local expertise, market timing, and a skilled negotiator in your corner. I work tirelessly to match you with a property that fits your lifestyle, budget, and long-term goals — and I don't stop until we find the perfect fit.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Understand your goals, timeline, and budget

steps.title: Pre-Approval Guidance
steps.description: Connect you with trusted mortgage professionals

steps.title: Negotiation
steps.description: Skilled negotiation to protect your interests

sellingServices.title: Selling
sellingServices.body: I market your home as if it were my own. From strategic pricing to professional photography, targeted digital campaigns, and skilled negotiation — every listing receives the premium treatment it deserves. My sellers consistently achieve above-asking results.

leasingServices.title: Leasing & Rentals
leasingServices.body: Whether you're a landlord seeking the ideal tenant or a renter searching for your next home, I handle the entire leasing process with the same professionalism as a purchase. Transparent communication, thorough tenant screening, and clear lease guidance.

commercialServices.title: Commercial Real Estate
commercialServices.body: Commercial transactions demand a different level of analysis — cap rates, tenant improvement allowances, zoning regulations, and lease structures. I bring institutional-quality thinking to every commercial deal, whether you're leasing office space or acquiring an investment property.

investmentServices.title: Investment Advisory
investmentServices.body: Real estate investment requires disciplined analysis and local market intelligence. I help investors identify high-performing opportunities, evaluate risk, and build portfolios that generate lasting wealth. From single-family rentals to multi-family acquisitions, I'm your data-driven partner.

capabilities.text: Cap rate and cash-on-cash return modeling

relocationServices.title: Relocation Services
relocationServices.body: Moving to Westchester County is one of the best decisions a family can make. I make the transition seamless — from neighborhood orientation to school district research, temporary housing, and a smooth home search that fits your new life. I've helped hundreds of families relocate to the area and make it home.

steps.title: Initial Call
steps.description: 30-minute conversation to understand your goals and timeline

steps.title: Strategy Session
steps.description: Tailored plan for buying, selling, or investing

steps.title: Search or Prep
steps.description: Property search or home preparation for listing

steps.title: Due Diligence
steps.description: Thorough inspections, attorney review, and financing

steps.title: Close & Celebrate
steps.description: Keys in hand and ready for your next chapter

cta.headline: Which service do you need? Let's talk.
